title: Shucos with Ranchitas Nacho Queso
instructions: Step 1. On a grill, toast the hot dog buns and sausages cut in half.
Step 2. Spread guacamole on the bun, add cabbage, Ranchitas to taste, sausage, and finally mayonnaise, ketchup, and mustard.
Step 3. Serve with diced onion and parsley.
description: Traditional Guatemalan shucos with a modern twist using Ranchitas Nacho Queso. Enhanced street food flavor!
